item.description: More detail on the Cycle Length Lemma, a basic result in the theory of random permutations. We prove a categorified version of this result, which is an equivalence of groupoids, and then derive the or...
item.content:encoded: More detail on the Cycle Length Lemma, a basic result in the theory of random permutations. We prove a categorified version of this result, which is an equivalence of groupoids, and then derive the original version by taking groupoid cardinalities.

item.description: Renaissance Philanthropy and XTX Markets have announced the launch of the AI for Math Fund, a new grant program supporting projects that apply AI and machine learning to mathematics, with a focus on a...
item.content:encoded: Renaissance Philanthropy and XTX Markets have announced the launch of the AI for Math Fund, a new grant program supporting projects that apply AI and machine learning to mathematics, with a focus on automated theorem proving, with an initial $9.2 million in funding. The project funding categories, and examples of projects in such categories, are: [‚Ä¶]
